message: If you are having problems seeing line statuses, please [update the app](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/tube-service/id1540626286).
detail: This was caused by the recent change to TFL overground lines (6 new lines have been added). Please [update the app](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/tube-service/id1540626286) to resolve this. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.
